item.title: Aran
item.description:
Fighter Archetype.
Cleave through waves of enemies, eventually gaining the strength to spin through entire armies. Aran is the premier AoE DPS martial.
1 - Smash Swing
You can use Great Cleave at-will.
This special attack becomes Smash Swing.
1 - Combat Step Elusive
If you Defeat an enemy during Smash Swing, you may activate Combat Step as a Swift Action to move an additional 10 feet without spending your movement. You can continue Smash Swing from the new location.
At level 2, you can Combat Step an additional time after the first as a Free Action.
At level 4, Combat Step is a Free Action.
As long as you don't move or take any additional actions after Smash Swing, you can use any other attacks you get from your weapon's AS or Superior Attacks to Defeat an enemy and qualify for Combat Step.
2 - Combo
After Defeating an enemy with a melee Attack, you get another Superior Attack that must be used before the end of your turn (doesn't work off-turn).
4 - Body Pressure
You can attack all group-type enemies normally and without penalty, and deal double damage to them. In addition, you cannot be flanked.
6 - Combo Drain Healing
Striking an enemy with Smash Swing heals 2 hp.
Only works in the adrenaline of true combat. Not even sparring triggers this.
8 - Aero Swing
If you Smash Swing while in the air, you may spend all of your remaining movement to hover in place until the start of your next turn. You may use this to Fly using your Combat Steps, should you Defeat enemies in the air.
10 - Adrenaline Rush
Superior Attacks deal maximum damage against opponents you struck with Smash Swing on the same turn.

item.title: Dark Knight
item.description:
Fighter Archetype.
Stand stalwart in the face of danger, an immovable obstacle that your opponents must fight tooth and nail to merely walk past, let alone survive. Outside of combat your massive skill bonuses can allow you to sense what others don't, and sniff out liars.
Based on the Maplestory class of the same name.
1 - Evil Eye Supernatural
You can manifest an ominous looking eye that floats around you, enhancing your senses and giving you a palpable aura of menace. You get Proficiency in Intimidation and Insight. You get a 4+½LV bonus to Perception, Insight and Intimidation. You also add this bonus against uses of Intimidation against you.
You can choose to make this eye disappear once per turn as a Free Action, but you lose the bonuses to Perception and Intimidation.
1 - No Escape
All effects that grant Elusive movement do not function against you while you wield a reach weapon, allowing you to make AoOs against a much larger number of creatures.
If a creature tries to move around you safely using Acrobatics while you wield a reach weapon, you add your Evil Eye bonus to your Reflex against them.
1 - Hyper Body
Passive. You get a +4 bonus to Fortitude. Your HP increases by 6+4/LV.
Standard Action, At-Will. Buff. Touched ally gains an additional 4/LV HP for 10 minutes. This is based on their level. Up to 3+CHA allies can benefit at once.
This buff ends when you are Defeated.
2 - Stalwart
You take half damage from Fortitude Saves. When you pass a fort save, it deals no damage and has no additional effect.
4 - Polearm Mastery
You can make an unlimited number of AoOs, and they have +4 ACC.
6 - Dread Fear
Enemies that end their turn in your reach must make Will saves or be Shaken 1. Minions do not get a save.
8 - Dark Impale Supernatural Concentration
Action-Attack, At-Will. Attack with a Pierce reach weapon. On hit, you leave a phantom copy of your weapon in the creature. The creature is unable to leave your natural reach and is Anchored. You can still use your weapon, but it is otherwise subject to Concentration rules, and the effect ends if you or the target are moved out of reach.
If you impale a second creature, the first is freed.
10 - Placeholder

item.title: Healer
item.description:
Healers are magicians that combine natural talent, a breadth of experience, and a compassion for life that results in abilities that lift spirits and mend wounds, both literally and metaphorically. A healer's mere presence commands a high degree of respect, as even a single healer behind the scenes can turn the tides of a battle. For this reason, healers are often involuntarily pulled into conflicts that do not concern them, as every government, army, church, and adventuring group seeks out their abilities, and every enemy of said groups seeks to eliminate them.

1 - Techniques
You gain full progression in Academy and Vitalism.
1 - Healing Touch Supernatural Healing
Action-Attack, At-Will. Touch a creature to restore SP+CL HP.
This ability cannot restore creatures above 50% HP, but any excess becomes Temp HP.
This can be done through a Staff.
1 - Channel Energy Supernatural Healing
Standard Action, Limited. Heal all allies with 60 Ft for 3 SP+CL HP.
Add +1 SP every odd level.
1 - Holy Arrow Supernatural Holy Healing
As an Action-Attack, conjure a magic bow and make a Ranged Attack with 20ft range. If it hits, the target takes Holy Damage equal to Healing Touch. If this attack passes through allies, apply Healing Touch to them.
This can be used through a Staff.
This Ranged Attack counts as being made from a Bow Weapon.
1 - Protective Aura
Allies gain +1 to Saves while within 10 Ft of you. This bonus increases by 1 at levels 4 and 8.
This aura is suppressed when you are Defeated, or activated or deactivated as a Free Action on your turn.

item.title: Marauder
item.description:
A Marauder focuses on aggressive movement to strike weak targets, surprising back lines and avoiding threats to gain unfair advantages.

1 - Ability
1 - Passive
1 - Speed Boost
Swift Action, At-Will. Dash. You can run on walls or ceilings with this movement. You fall at the end of your turn if you are not on the ground.
1 - Maim
When you hit a Surprised❗ creature, perform an AoO, or succeed at a Combat Maneuver, the target's Speed is reduced by 5, stacking. This lasts until they spend a Standard Action or an ally uses Aid, which removes one stack.
If their Speed is reduced to 0, your next hit against them cripples them permanently, inflicting Affliction - Hamstringed.
1 - Stowaway
You gain Hide in Plain Sight when holding or using containers as cover.
2 - Sure Footing
Your movement isn't slowed by difficult terrain, and you need not make checks to keep your balance in precarious situations, such as when stepping on ice or grease.

item.title: The Boss
item.description:
The beast that thrives in the middle of the fight, taking a beating and striking back twice as hard.

1 - Vital Spirit
When below half HP, Gain FH 1.
1 - Haymaker
Action-Attack, Recharge. Can only be used below half HP.
Gain Temp HP equal to a quarter of your HP until the start of your next turn, and deal the same amount as Magic Damage in a 30ft cone (Reflex halves).
You can target one creature in melee range with an Unarmed Attack, which deals its damage and applies a -2 penalty to their save. The cone then originates from them.
2 - Skull Breaker
On your turn, when you land Unarmed Attacks against two different creatures, are Grabbing two creatures, or do some combination of Attacks, Combat Maneuvers, or Grabs, you pull them adjacent to each other and attempt to Stun them for one round (Fortitude negates).
Once stunned, a given creature is not susceptible to being Stunned again until you Recharge.
2 - Meat Shield
Immediate Action, Recharge. When targeted with an attack, redirect the attack to a creature that you are Grabbing.
4 - Flying Pigs
Gain Foe Throw as an Innate Technique. You can use it as a Free Action. You can apply Skull Breaker when you hit two targets.
4 - Convincing Fists
Gain +4 Intimidation against creatures you have hit with an Unarmed Attack since you last rested.
6 - No Guard
Free Action, At-Will. Provoke an AoO. If anyone chooses to take their shot, they automatically hit you, but they also Provoke from you, and you can automatically hit them if you so choose.
This can be combined with Haymaker to use it as a Free Action and automatically land the Unarmed Attack.
8 - Bulk Up
On any round you do not make an Attack or cast a Spell, you gain Resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn.
10 - Showstopper
Action-Attack, Limited. Become Unstoppable as you move up to your speed and snatch a creature, and continue moving up to your speed in a straight line with the creature as you carry them through the air.
When you land, the target and adjacent creatures take your Haymaker damage and are Staggered (Fortitude halves and negates).

item.title: Martial Artist
item.description:
Masters of mind and body that perform incredible feats of talent and willpower with their weaponized bodies through grit, asceticism, or flashy techniques.

1 - Techniques
You gain 1 Technique point at level 1, then another point every 2 levels after. These technique points can be used on anything.
You gain full progression in Warfare and Martial Arts.
1 - Flurry
Action-Attack Martial Arts Techniques, Combat Maneuvers, and Unarmed Attacks gain +1 AS.
Unarmed Attacks deal d4 Damage rather than 1.
1 - Core Strength
While wearing Light or no Armor and not using a Shield, you gain +5 Speed/LV and +6 AC vs Combat Maneuvers.
1 - Fighting Style
Gain a Fighting Style Feat.

item.title: Bandit
item.description:
Rogue Archetype.
A professional thief, a blur of shadows around the battlefield taking everything their opponents have and stepping back before they realize what happened.
Your very shadow steps out to reach into people's pockets when they aren't looking.
1 - Pickpocket
Crits drop coins around the target. When collected, roll Critical Damage to see how many you get; if you collect them, it's worth quadruple. You can collect the coins as a free action, but other creatures must spend an action to collect or otherwise move the money. Before it's looted or moved, the coins are Blood Money.
This ability represents taking something away from your opponent with each hit. If you use it while sparring or against allies to "farm" money, they may need that money back to replace the golden tooth they lost, jewelry you pilfered, the kidney you stole etc.
DM discretion.
1 - Cunning Action: Steal
You can use Cunning Action to Steal. You can use Steal to produce Blood Money once per creature.
Your Cunning Actions have +10 reach.
1 - Coin Explosion (Recharge)
Action-Attack. Explode ALL of your Blood Money, dealing your Critical Damage for every pile exploded in their tiles and adjacent tiles. The damage stacks, including with overlap (Reflex halves). You are immune to this damage.
Even though each explosion is a separate instance of damage, creatures only roll their save once against all of them.
2 - Band of Thieves Companion Summoning
You can easily find and hire goons to call upon for aid. These are humanoids with half your HP (including when summoned), and +1 DEX and LUK. They are half your level. They have no other abilities or statistics of their own (no techniques, feats, class features, etc).
You may equip them as you please, and Summon them as a Cunning Action as per a Summoning Contract. They take their turn on your turn - the player controls them.
They can use Steal and Critical Hits to create Blood Money for you, using your statistics. They have their own limit for Steal.
4 - Grand Larceny
When you use the Steal action, you can Steal from everything in reach.
4 - Coin Collection
Gain +20% Wealth.
6 - Assaulter Teleportation
Action-Attack, At-Will. Teleport to an enemy that is Surprised❗, up to 30ft, and Attack.
8 - Advanced Dark Sight
Steal no longer ends Dark Sight.
Natural Crits no longer end Dark Sight.

item.title: Rogue
item.description:
Masters of stealth, infiltration, and execution. The rogue is "that guy" someone knows who's the man for the job. The rogue is the guy who knows people higher up in town as much as those in the underbelly of society. Out-skill and outsmart your foes with the power of planning, tactics, and playing dirty.

1 - Techniques
You gain full progression in Scoundrel and Warfare.
1 - Ability
1 - Passive
1 - Sneak Attack
Surprise❗ Attacks have +20 Crit Chance. In most cases, this means all Surprise attack hits are Critical Hits - you have a 100% critical hit rate with them.
1 - Critical Edge
Add another d10+LUK to your Critical Damage.
1 - Backstep
Once on your turn, during or after movement, you can move backwards on the path you took Elusive 10 ft without spending movement.
1 - Cunning Action
Once per round, gain an additional Standard Action or Swift Action that can't be used to Attack or cast a Spell. This must be a different action than you use with your regular standard or swift action.
1 - Dark Sight
Immediate Action, Recharge. Gain the ability to use Stealth anywhere and Hide on the same action, as well as cause all Accuracy checks against you to fail. Lasts five turns, or until you Attack, cast a Spell, or otherwise take an offensive action. Creatures that are not using Detect do not get additional checks to spot you.
1 - Haste Buff
Standard Action, At-Will. Grant a touched ally +10 Speed and Jump for 10 minutes. Up to 3+CHA allies can benefit at the same time.
You gain this benefit passively.
2 - Evasion
You take half damage from Reflex save effects, and no damage when you pass the save.
2 - Rogue Talent
You gain a Rogue Talent every even level.
4 - Stroke of Luck
(1+LUK) times per day, you can force a specific serendipitous event as a free action. Advantageous scenarios could be something like a cart of hay to catch your fall, or a bird smashing into a window to get a guard to investigate. Things with a DC of 15 or lower happens automatically. Anything higher requires a roll.
6 - Uncanny Dodge
Stealth, Blindness, and Invisibility do not cause attacks to Surprise❗ you.
8 - Reliable Talent
If you Roll less than 10 on a Skill check, instead roll a 10.

item.title: Spirit Walker
item.description:
Summoner Archetype.
Spirit Walkers are those that specialize in harnessing the power of malevolent fiends from the material plane. They invoke these beings to impose their will upon their enemies and the world to achieve their objectives. While the summoned spirits, fiends, and planar creatures are typically evil, these abilities can be employed for either good or ill.

You can use unique rituals to call specific powerful fiends to your side, or to influence your fate.
1 - Adversary Kishin Shōkan
Requesting Adversity from a Adversary Kishin is a one minute ritual.
When invoking a Kishin, you are choosing to deliberately and unequivocally escalate the difficulty of a particular quest or journey. You must clearly communicate your desires and plan, knowing the Kishin's sole purpose is your suffering and demise. Each wish you make to it grants tougher challenges, and should you overcome these additional challenges, proportionally greater rewards. It functions by manipulating fate, making your journey difficult through united foes, prepared adversaries, and inherent animosity. You can only choose the amount of hardship to inflict upon yourself; the Kishin decides how this hardship manifests. The Kishin grants suffering of any scale, from mild annoyances to lethal curses.
The most common method it uses is to cause all of your enemies to converge on you at once. The second most common method is adding an army of undead to the ranks of your enemies, either through simple alliance, or by animating your foes the moment they are defeated.
Kishin Characteristics
The Kishin is a fierce deity of hardship and calamity. It aims to amplify bloodshed and amplify your torment. On manifestation, it appears as a translucent humanoid with short horns, adorned in elaborate robes, and blindfolded. Its sinister smile, bearing shark-like teeth, is its only distinct feature.
Kishin may manifest physically to deliver aid to your foes in person.

item.title: Avatar
item.description:
An Avatar is a creature that is bound to a Summoner, and vice versa. Use the following to determine its statistics. Its statistics are not reduced from being a summoned creature.
For ease of play reasons, it is assumed that your Avatar generally does as you wish, and that you are allowed to control all of its actions in combat, though it does still have a will of its own.

Techniques
An Avatar has access to all of the techniques of its Summoner.
It gains full progression in Warfare.
Language
Your Avatar speaks one language of your choosing (that you know), plus any language native to its plane of origin.
Form
Avatars vary in form, and the form they take determines what innate qualities they have.

The following are modifiers that can be applied to the base form.

item.title: Summoner
item.description:
Summoners are diverse spellcasters that focus on their ability to summon powerful creatures to their aid with greater ease and effect than others. Their signature ability is that of summoning an Avatar, a typically extraplanar being that is bonded to the Summoner, which can be far more powerful and useful than a typical summoned creature. Their bond allows them to share abilities, allowing superior self-contained teamwork.
All Summoner abilities are Supernatural.

1 - Techniques
You gain 2 technique points at level 1, then another 2 points every 2 levels after. These technique points can be used on any path.
You gain full progression in Academy.
1 - Planar Avatar Summoning, Companion
You gain the service of a specific outsider on your journey. See more in the Avatar section.
Standard Action, Recharge. You may summon or dismiss your Avatar without any equipment or staff needed. It is assumed your Summoning Contract is embedded into your and their bodies, such as in the form of a tattoo. There are no limits to how many times you can summon them, or for how long. Should they be Defeated, they gain Summoning Sickness. However, you can choose to self-inflict Drained 2 during a long rest to remove the condition from them prematurely.
Your Avatar is usually assumed to be from another plane of existence, such as a demon from the pits of hell. It can summon you to its aid just as you can. While summoned, an Avatar has a leash range of 5000. If it leaves this range, it is dismissed.
Unless you arrange with your DM for your Avatar to have its own busy life, it is assumed to always be available to be summoned at a moment's notice. Work with your DM to ensure the way it is incorporated into the game is to your liking. It's okay to have an Avatar that has no responsibilities on its home plane, and is otherwise not an important part of the story. It's a major part of your character, after all.
1 - Summon Ally
You can use Summoning Contracts as an Action. You cannot have a regular Summoning effect at the same time as your Avatar.
1 - Life Link
Standard Action, At-Will. Transfer up to half of your current HP to your Avatar. The Avatar also gains this ability towards you.
1 - Share Senses
Standard Action, At-Will. Experience the world through any of your summoned creature's senses for one round. The Avatar also gains this ability towards you.
1 - Ally Switch Teleportation
Immediate Action, Limited. Trade places with an ally within 30. This can be used in response to an attack or ability, causing it to affect the other person as they appear in that location.
10 - Conjure Ally
You can Prepare any one Conjuration Companion Technique from Technique trees you have not unlocked.
You can only select from Techniques that are normally unlocked through Technique Points.

item.title: Fall Damage
item.description:
Fall damage increases by 3 Crush for every 10 feet you fall, capped at 60 damage. Every 50 feet you are also Drained 1, capped at 4.
When determining fall distance, subtract your Jump.
If you take more damage than your AC (Fell), you are Knocked Down.

item.title: Affliction - Hamstringed
item.description:
Tier 1 Affliction
Description - Your leg muscles have been grabbed, torn, tenderized, and shredded, bringing great pain and hindering your mobility.
Effect - Your speeds that rely on your legs are halved.
Cure - Healing and resting for day.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Afflictions/Tier 1 Afflictions/Affliction - Hamstringed.md

item.title: Affliction
item.description:
A type of permanent negative effect that can usually only be removed by taking some time off to rest, recuperate and relax. Afflictions come in tiers from 1-3. Higher tier afflictions usually require more extreme forms of care to remove. They are similar to Curses, but are often not magical in nature.
Tier 1 Afflictions usually only take a day of rest, Tier 2 tend to take a week, and Tier 3 tend to only be cured when meeting special conditions.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Afflictions/Affliction.md

item.title: Dazed
item.description: A more severe version of Staggered. Creature cannot take a Standard Action and cannot make AoOs. -15 Speed.

item.title: Knocked Down
item.description:
Creature is knocked Prone until the start of the inflicting creature or effect's next turn, at which point the condition ends without Provoking or spending Movement, unless the creature is Held Down.
Swimming creatures can be prone, but airborne creatures become Grounded instead.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Knocked Down.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Prone
item.description:
Creature is lying down or otherwise on the ground, has -4 AC and ACC, and can't move unless they spend 30 movement to end the condition, which Provokes.
Prone creatures gain +4 AC against Ranged Attacks instead.
This condition ends automatically after one round unless otherwise stated.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Prone.md

item.title: Tradesman
item.description:
You worked in a job that required a specialized form of training, such as an alchemist, a doctor or a blacksmith. Over the years of your work you have accumulated a few tools of the trade.
Select one of the following presets, or make one that's similar. Regardless of the selected trade, you have a place of work that you can return to that views you favorably, has masterwork equipment available for use, and that you can get +10% Wealth from with related sales and deals.
Doctor - You start off with a medicine kit, a dose of troll oil, and 3 doses of Bloodblock.
Alchemist - Start off with an alchemist kit, a love potion, and 2 alchemist fires.
Craftsman (weapons/armor) - Start off with a set of combat ready equipment. You can start off with

Heavy armor and a weapon
Medium armor, 3 melee weapons, a ranged weapon, and a shield
Light armor, 6 light melee weapons, 2 ranged weapons, and a shield
See Backgrounds

item.title: Close
item.description:
Close Weapons are a group of Weapons that are "1-handed".
These represent punches, kicks, claws, and headbutts that can be used in the closest of combat, even when pinned. These attacks can be with one's own Natural Weapons, or with weapons augmenting their limbs.
The following are the Basic Weapons in the Close group.

item.title: Polearm
item.description:
Polearms are a group of Weapons that are 2-handed.
These are long skirmish weapons for battlefield versatility. They combine the spacing of spears with the swings of axes. Often used to hook enemies in addition to being general weapons.
The following are the Basic Weapons in the Polearm group.
item.guid: Equipment/Weapon Rules/Weapon Types and Basic Weapons/Polearm.md

item.title: Thrown
item.description:
Thrown weapons are a group of Weapons that are almost always 1-handed.
These are weapons designed to be thrown using a swing from the hand or sling. Casters are armored gauntlets with thrown ammunition stored inside, used to draw and throw faster and harder. Many Thrown weapons are also Ammunition.
The following are the Basic Weapons in the Thrown group.
item.guid: Equipment/Weapon Rules/Weapon Types and Basic Weapons/Thrown.md

item.title: Trigger
item.description:
Trigger weapons are a group of Weapons that can be 1-handed or 2-handed.
These are weapons with handles that are loaded beforehand and then fire their ammunition with a trigger.
Trigger weapons do not add STR to damage.
The following are the Basic Weapons in the Trigger group.

item.title: Demon Style
item.description:
Fighting Style Feat
You get a +2 bonus to attack and damage with Unarmed Attacks for 1 round when you take the Charge action. You can turn once during your charge.
When you strike a creature with a Charge Attack, you can then Drag or Shove them as a Swift Action.
Successful Drag or Shove attempts deal your Unarmed Damage to the creature.

item.description:
Fighting Style Feat
When a creature misses you with an attack, you can move 10 Elusive Ft closer to it. If this movement puts you within reach of the attacker, it provokes an AoO. This AoO must be an Unarmed Attack.
When you would be hit with an attack, you can spend an Immediate Action to make an opposed Attack Roll. If you match or exceed their roll, you instead negate the attack, which activates the passive effect.

item.description:
CHA-based Skill, normally rolled against Insight.
Used to Lie, Disguise, Feint, Create a Distraction, Subtle Message, and Skills/Deception/Sucker Punch.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Clothesline
item.description:
Tier 1 Martial Arts Technique
AoO, Recharge

As an AoO, make an Unarmed Attack that reduces the target's Speed to 0 on hit.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Defensive Spin
item.description:
Tier 1 Martial Arts Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge
Elusive

Make an Unarmed Attack against a creature, and gain +2 AC against it. Your movement is Elusive against this creature.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Foot Stomp
item.description:
Tier 1 Martial Arts Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Make an Unarmed Attack in the form of a kick towards the opponent's lower limbs. They must be on or near the floor (such as by hovering).
On hit, they are Grounded for one round, and if they move away from you during this time they become Clumsy 4 (though, if you are forcible moved away or Prone, they can move away without penalty).
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Night Punch
item.description:
Tier 1 Martial Arts Technique
Immediate Action, At-Will

Make an Unarmed Attack to start a fight as if automatically succeeding at using Sucker Punch.
If another creature used Sucker Punch on you, you can immediately respond with this.
This move cannot be used after the start of combat.
Upcast 1 +d8 Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Sky Uppercut
item.description:
Tier 1 Martial Arts Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Jump straight up at a creature and make an Unarmed Attack against it. Your Jump height is doubled for this.
You must be on a surface off of which you can Jump to perform this Technique.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Catch Blade
item.description:
Tier 2 Martial Arts Technique
Immediate Action, Recharge

When you are targeted with a Manufactured Melee Weapon Attack, make an opposed Unarmed Attack Roll. If you beat the incoming Roll, you grab onto the weapon. This takes up your free hand.
You and the target cannot move away without someone letting go of the weapon. Whoever is hit by a Combat Maneuver during this automatically lets go.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Chi Block
item.description:
Tier 2 Martial Arts Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Make an Unarmed Attack. On hit, the target is Siphoned.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Low Sweep
item.description:
Tier 2 Martial Arts Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

All targets must save or be Knocked Down. All targets become Clumsy 1.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Ora Aura
item.description:
Tier 5 Martial Arts Technique
Passive

You can make an Unarmed Attack as an Instant Action against any enemy that enters your reach at any point in a round, though only once per round per creature.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Martial Arts
item.description:
Martial Art Techniques focus on a devastating and clever suite of Unarmed attacks, each with its own tactical niche and dramatic flair.
While not as powerful as cleaving enemies in two or slinging balls of fire, these Techniques compensate with a variety of useful effects to disrupt enemies and close gaps in combat.
Unless otherwise stated, Martial Arts must be performed with Unarmed attacks.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Detect Magic
item.description:
Tier 2 Academy Spell
Standard Action, At-Will
Concentration
Divination

While concentrating on the spell, you are detect the presence of magic in the area. This includes Spell effects, Supernatural effects, and magic items.
At first, you are only aware of the presence or absence of magic. After something remains in the cone for one full round, you can tell where it is located, and details such as how many magic effects are on a creature you can see. You can tell distinguished effects apart from the general noise of magical presence.
This means that new magic that enters the area will be distinguishable from what you have already detected in the area. New magic must still be in the area for a full round to detect its precise location.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Charming Gaze
item.description:
Tier 1 Enthrallment Spell
Standard Action, At-Will
Subtle, Mind-Affecting
Illusion

You lock your eyes onto a target and Charm them (Will negates). If you're currently engaged in combat with the creature, the spell's duration is 1 minute. If you are not, the spell's duration is 8 hours. Entering combat against them shortens the remaining duration to 1 minute.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Command
item.description:
Tier 2 Enthrallment Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Mind-Affecting, Language-Dependent
Illusion

You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity (Will negates). You may select from the following options.
Approach - On its turn, the subject moves directly towards you 30 ft and Provokes. It cannot use its movement beyond this.
Drop It - On its turn, the subject drops whatever it is holding. It can’t pick up any dropped item on the same turn it drops it.
Kneel - The subject is Knocked Down. It may act normally, but takes any appropriate penalties. It may not stand up early.
Begone - On its turn, the subject moves 30 ft directly away from you and Provokes. It cannot use its movement beyond this.
Praise Me - The subject babbles on about your greatness, effectively leaving them Silenced for 1 round.
If the subject can’t carry out your command on its next turn, it defaults to Kneel.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Unnatural Lust
item.description:
Tier 1 Enthrallment Spell
Standard Action, Recharge
Mind-Affecting, Subtle
Illusion

When you cast the spell, you choose two targets. The initial target is filled with lust. The second target doesn't get affected by anything, but rather determines where this lust is directed towards. The initial target must spend the entirety of its next turn moving towards the secondary target and then caressing, hugging, or kissing them (Will negates).
A creature gets a +4 to its save if it would not normally be sexually attracted to the secondary target. By succeeding on a Monster Lore check against a creature, you can determine what an appropriate secondary target for this spell would be.
After failing its save and satisfying its carnal desires, a creature becomes more resistant to the spell and always receives the +4 bonus on subsequent casts against it for one minute.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Exhibition
item.description:
Tier 2 Enthrallment Spell
Standard Action, Recharge
Mind-Affecting, Glamer, Subtle
Illusion

You cause all of the creature's equipment to visually disappear, making them appear naked or barely clothed (Will negates).
For the duration of the spell, the creature acts as though it has no equipment, and cannot use anything dependent on equipment, such as shield actions, spell casting, and weapon special attacks. At the end of each turn, the creature gets a new save to end the effect.
They still get any passive bonuses to their equipment, such as AC from Armor and Shields.
When used on an ally, this spell lasts for one hour, but they are still able to use their equipment. Equipment in their hands is not affected.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Sense Motive
item.description:
Tier 2 Enthrallment Spell
Passive
Divination

While this technique is prepared, you gain a +4 bonus to Insight checks. Whenever you glean something using Insight, you can transfer the knowledge you gain to any creature you can see as vague impressions, effectively treating it as though they had succeeded in using Detect Dishonesty.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Ecstasy
item.description:
Tier 3 Enthrallment Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Mind-Affecting
Illusion

You fill a creature's mind with pleasure, causing it to lose focus. The creature is Dazed for 1 round and Staggered the round after (Will reduces to Staggered for 1 round).
If the target creature could reasonably be sexually attracted to the caster, then the DC is increased by 1. If the caster is naked, or barely clothed, the DC is increased by an additional 1.
Upcast 1 - Target one additional creature.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Seduce
item.description:
Tier 4 Enthrallment Spell
Action-Attack, Limited
Mind-Affecting, Concentration
Illusion

Creatures in the area that fail their save must spend all of their Movement every turn getting closer to you, or to a creature of your choosing.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Enthrallment
item.description:
Enthrallment spells focus on deceit, as well as mental domination of both overt and subtle varieties.
Most of this spell list was created by studying the abilities of Shira, a fiend lord Kitsune who stole Free Will from the world for her personal amusement. She is a master of subterfuge, and often exists among mortals, playing along with their politics and wars for fun. Being the least abrasive and the most approachable, Shira is the fiend lord the most mortals find intertwined in their life, often not knowing that they deal with a fiend.
Over an enormous period of time, new fields of natural magic formed to fill in the void left by Free Will, such as a Vampire's ability to make thralls. Part of the spell list is sourced from the natural abilities of such creatures.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Handholding
item.description:
Tier 1 Vitalism Spell
One Minute Cast Time, Limited
Conjuration

You and your ally count as within reach of each other when using spells on each other. This functions up to 30 ft away.
This spell creates a visible magic hand to hold theirs.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Circle of Sealing
item.description:
Tier 2 Vitalism Spell
One Minute Cast Time, Limited
M Silver Dust worth 100g
Abnegation

You move around to inscribe a magic circle on the ground (up to 20 Ft Diameter), then infuse it with Mana to cause a tangible but transparent barrier to appear, sealing the Fiend inside of it. The Fiend is unable to pass through this barrier, or go under/over it. It is Anchored and Siphoned while inside. Otherwise, the Fiend may act as it wishes.
If the barrier is ever damaged from the outside, it automatically breaks, so care must be taken to protect trapped demons. The magic circle has 50 HP and a Weakness to Magic Damage.
You may only trap a Fiend of a LV up to your CL.
This spell is normally used to interact with the target safely, or to buy time while searching for a way to destroy it safely.

item.title: Chinese Folklore Notes
item.description:
Feat: Corpse Walker
Using a bell, hand signs, or spell tags, unburied bodies can be temporarily animated with mana to follow the driver. This is primarily used to bring corpses to sacred burial grounds in a ceremonial way or through prohibitive terrain.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Explorer
item.description:
Explorers are the generalist healers with a handful of utility abilities that assist with travel. They promote treating creatures with mercy whenever possible, and in the most extreme examples, can make death impossible. Their aura is powerful enough that existing near them makes you safer.
1 - Aura of Mercy Supernatural
Creatures in your Protective Aura cannot die.
This aura has a distinct, personalized visual component that interferes with stealth.
1 - Lucky Break
Immediate Action, At-Will. Add LUK to a Roll in your Protective Aura.
You cannot add LUK twice to a given Roll.
1 - Compassion Mind-Affecting
When you use Channel Energy, enemies in range that were aggressors/not acting in self-defense are Pacified for 5 rounds (Will negates). They get a new save at the end of their turns if you or your allies take aggressive actions versus their allies, and it ends immediately if you or your allies take aggressive actions towards them.
If there are no enemies left, initiative ends, and this ability can be extended for up to 10 minutes as long as you try resolving the conflict peacefully.
2 - Cure Supernatural Healing
When you use Healing Touch, creatures get a new save against any lingering effects that would normally give additional saves (such as Poisoned and some Mind-Affecting effects). Does not apply to permanent status like Cursed or Drained.
2 - Endure Elements
Creatures that touch your Aura of Mercy receive a blessing for 1 hour. This blessing allows them to exist inside of otherwise hazardous environments without harm. Blessed creatures ignore environmental effects like toxic volcanic gas, thin air at extreme heights, extremes in temperature, the vacuum of space or the pressure/lack of air in underwater environments.
This does not make you immune to hazardous weather, such as hail, windstorms, lightning, or quicksand; only passive effects that prevent you from existing are blocked.
4 - Mystic Door Supernatural Teleportation
One Minute Cast Time, Limited. When you rest in a settlement of at least 100 people, you can mark one of the doorways, portals, or similar entrance in the place you rested as your Mystic Doorstep.
As long as you are within 10 miles of the place you slept, you can conjure a Mystic Door that links to the Mystic Doorstep for one minute. It is the same size as the entry you marked.
It takes one minute to cast. Any creature can take the portal back simply by walking through it, but it is one-way. Once the Mystic Door disappears, so does your Mystic Doorstep.
This effect does not require line of sight.
4 - Focus Dispel Supernatural
Standard Action, Recharge. Touch a creature. On an ally, one harmful Spell or Supernatural effect immediately ends, unless it is permanent. On an enemy, this functions as Dispel. For cursed items, this allows the safe removal of the item, but requires a caster level check.
6 - Blessing of Restoration Supernatural Healing
You recover from all stacks of Drained every time you rest, regardless of conditions.
As a Standard Action, you can touch a creature to transfer a stack of Drained from them to yourself. A creature can only be affected by this once each week.
8 - Elemental Protection Supernatural
Gain resistance to a Damage type, except for Magic. Allies in your aura also gain this.
You can change what you're resistant to when you Short Rest.
10 - Angel Ray
Your Holy Arrow applies Focus Dispel, and has +10 Range.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Drag
item.description: Requires a free hand or prehensile appendage. Target creature stays adjacent to you for the remainder of your turn. If the creature is not adjacent to you when you successfully drag, they are automatically pulled adjacent to you. You can choose any space within your natural reach to place the creature in at the end of your drag.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Attacking/Combat Maneuvers/Drag.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Bleed
item.description:
Bleeding creatures lose the specified amount of HP at the start of each of their turns for a specified duration. If no duration is specified, it lasts indefinitely. The DC to stop the bleeding (with the Medicine skill, or magic healing with a CL check) is the attacker's Potency.
Unlike most sources of Damage, Bleed effects do not deal a specific type of damage. They act as their own type in the sense that creatures can resist or be immune to it, but Bleed is a condition and not a real Damage type.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Bleed.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.description: Cold is a Damage type Tag, representing the disruption of movement and natural processes through cold and freezing.

item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Crush
item.description: Crush is a Damage type Tag, which represents bludgeoning attacks, shockwaves, and blunt force trauma.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Tags/Damage Types/Crush.md

item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Tags/Damage Types/Pierce.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.description: Psychic is a Damage type Tag, representing an assault on a creature's mind. Usually ineffective against Mindless creatures.

item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Companion
item.description:
In media it's very common for creatures to have minions, squires and sidekicks. This is what the companion system is for. Like most other content, the companion system is ill-suited for large quantities of creatures, like armies. It's meant to be more compact. Something to take with you on the go for your adventure. This could also reasonably extend to temporary allies that join your party.
Companions are generally tied to your class, abilities and items. Any such ability is marked with this tag.
If an ability has the companion tag, it summons an ally, or otherwise serves some kind of interpersonal function.
You can have 1+CHA Companions.
Companions always act on your turn if you are present. There is no separation between your turns, you all act in the same Initiative (rolled by you).
Companions gain bonuses or penalties based off of your CHA.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Cerberus Style
item.description:
Fighting Style Feat
When you are being Flanked, you gain the attack bonus against the creatures Flanking you.
When you make Unarmed Attacks against a creature that is Flanking you, you can use a Swift Action to have them apply to another creature Flanking you this turn.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Dragon Style
item.description:
Fighting Style Feat
Your unarmed strikes double their STR bonus to Damage.
When you Critically Strike, you can unleash a 15 Ft cone behind the target as a Swift Action that deals the same damage as Magic Damage, Reflex halves.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Fighting Style
item.description: A Fighting Style Feat is a Feat that grants a Passive and active ability when using Unarmed attacks.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Grabbing Style
item.description:
Fighting Style Feat
Gain +2 to Grab attempts. When you Grab a creature, you are not Entangled, instead only suffering -15 Speed.
When you Grab or maintain a Grab on a creature, you can attempt to Grab another creature as a Swift Action. Maintaining a Grab works on all Grabbed creatures.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Monkey Style
item.description:
You can crawl and climb at full Speed. You can stand up early from Knockdown without spending Movement.
When you strike a creature at least your size with an Unarmed Attack, you can begin to ride them as a Swift Action. This causes you to enter their space and follow their movement without spending any of your own. You gain Cover while riding, and if this bonus AC would cause an Attack to miss you, it hits the creature you're riding.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Acrobatics
item.description:
DEX-based Skill.
Used for Balance, Tumble, and Wall Kick.

item.title: Tumble
item.description: If Trained in Acrobatics, you can avoid AoOs from moving through Threatened spaces. Acrobatics is rolled against all threatening creatures’ Reflex saves. The DC of their reflex save is equal to your Acrobatics Roll. If they succeed, your movement Provokes as normal.

item.title: Blessing of Restoration
item.description:
Healer Innate Technique
Passive, Standard Action, At-Will

You recover from all stacks of Drained every time you rest, regardless of conditions.
As a Standard Action, you can touch a creature to transfer a stack of Drained from them to yourself. A creature can only be affected by this once each week.
item.guid: Techniques/Class and Weapon Abilities/Healer/Blessing of Restoration.md

Healer Innate Technique
Standard Action, Limited
Healing

Restore 3 SP+CL HP.
Upcast 1 (base Tier 1) - +1 SP Healing.

item.title: Focus Dispel
item.description:
Class Innate Technique
Standard Action, Recharge

On an ally, one harmful Spell or Supernatural effect immediately ends, unless it is permanent. On an enemy, this functions as Dispel. For cursed items, this allows the safe removal of the item, but requires a CL check.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Healing Touch
item.description:
Healer Innate Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will
Supernatural, Healing

Touch a creature to restore SP+CL HP.
This ability cannot restore creatures above 50% HP, but any excess becomes Temp HP.
This can be done through a Staff.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Holy Arrow
item.description:
Healer Innate Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Conjure a magic bow and make a Ranged Attack with 20ft range. If it hits, the target takes Holy Damage equal to Healing Touch. If this attack passes through allies, apply Healing Touch to them.
This can be used through a Staff.
This Ranged Attack counts as being made from a Bow Weapon.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Hug
item.description:
Healer Innate Technique
Passive, Standard Action, At-Will

When you initiate a Grab on an enemy, they are Pacified for 1 round instead of the usual effects.
You can Mana Burn 1 to hug an ally as a Standard Action, putting them in Stasis for one round, and removing any Fear effects.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Mystic Door
item.description:
Healer Innate Technique
One Minute Cast Time, Limited
Supernatural Teleportation

When you rest in a settlement of at least 100 people, you can mark one of the doorways, portals, or similar entrance in the place you rested as your Mystic Doorstep.
As long as you are within 10 miles of the place you slept, you can conjure a Mystic Door that links to the Mystic Doorstep for one minute. It is the same size as the entry you marked.
It takes one minute to cast. Any creature can take the portal back simply by walking through it, but it is one-way. Once the Mystic Door disappears, so does your Mystic Doorstep.
This effect does not require line of sight.

Elusive

Move 10 Ft.

Make a Ranged Attack with a Trigger weapon. This attack has +20 ACC and deals 5 CL bonus damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Sending
item.description:
Tier 1 Psychomancy Spell
Standard Action, Recharge
Divination

You deliver a message to a creature over any distance, without Line of Effect. In order to communicate with a creature, you must have met them, and you must know their name.
When you cast the spell, you telepathically communicate simple ideas that require no more than two sentences to convey (Monsters are attacking the north gate. How do we respond?). Your target can reply with the same restrictions.
If your message is too complex or too long, the creature is dead, or the creature is on another plane, then the message gets lost in the ether and the caster takes 1 Psychic Damage.
You can only cast sending on a particular creature once each day, or else it becomes Limited.
Upcast 2 - Establish a link that lasts up to 10 Minutes, allowing free back-and-forth conversation. This makes the ability Limited.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Psychomancy
item.description:
Psychomancy involves the use of mind magic to gather information and out maneuver foes before the battles even begin.
If it does come down to a fight, you can crush foes' minds or toss them around with Telekinesis.
Long distance communication is made easy with spells like Dream and Sending.
Creatures won't be able to keep secrets from you with access to spells like Detect Thoughts and Memory Movie.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Death Ward
item.description:
Tier 1 Vitalism Spell
Standard Action, At-Will
Transmutation

Touched creature is marked with a rune. Creatures marked with Death Ward cannot kill other creatures marked with Death Ward by Defeat alone.
This is primarily used to prevent death in organized duels.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: CL
item.description:
Spells often include Caster Level as part of their total damage, or they may use it in calculating opposed checks, such as when dispelling. Martial Techniques can also use Caster Level as part of their damage, but it is much less common.
By default, your CL is equal to your LV, and your spell's CL is equal to yours plus any bonuses you have to it, such as from Staves and Feats.
Usually, the term refers to the effect's CL itself, not the user's personal CL. Usually, a creature's personal CL does not deviate from their level much, if at all. Therefore, assume any use of CL does not refer to personal CL unless otherwise noted.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Straw Puppet
item.description:
Straw Puppet, LV 0 Construct Fey

Attacks

Abilities


Other Traits


A Straw Puppet is a Fey creation whose only purpose is to prank people by triggering irrational anger in them at inopportune moments. It otherwise appears to be a completely innocuous scarecrow or practice dummy.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Supernatural
item.description: Supernatural abilities encompass any ability that is magical, but not a Spell.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Abbreviations and Terminology/Supernatural.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: CHA
item.description:
Charisma (CHA): Your leadership and personal magnetism.
Positive charisma enhances your Companion creatures. You can grant Companion creatures one of your Feats per CHA.
For every point of CHA, you gain another Companion slot.
You cannot control Companion creatures with negative CHA.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Ability Scores/CHA.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Delay
item.description: You can wait for a later spot in Initiative. If you're already at the bottom, you can wait until a later round. When you decide to re-enter Initiative, your Initiative changes to the spot you enter.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Actions/Common Actions/Free Actions/Delay.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Swap Item
item.description: At the start of your turn, you can decide what's in your hands from your inventory. You can draw and put away any weapons without penalty. This is a Free Action as long as it's done at the start of your turn. If you decide to change what you're wielding at another point in your turn, it becomes a Swift Action - and you can't do both.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Actions/Common Actions/Free Actions/Swap Item.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Fall Prone
item.description: You can willingly inflict Knocked Down on yourself as an Instant Action.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Actions/Common Actions/Instant Actions/Fall Prone.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Administer Potion
item.description:
Give a potion to an unconscious ally as a Standard Action. You can use potions from either of your inventories.
A conscious ally must spend an Immediate Action to drink an administered potion.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Actions/Common Actions/Standard Actions/Administer Potion.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Aid
item.description:
Provide one of the following bonuses to an ally within your reach for 1 round as a Standard Action:
+2 to ACC against foes you both threaten
+2 to Saves
+2 to AC
Alternatively, remove one stack of the following conditions: Clumsy, Shaken, Sickened, or Knocked Down.
Note: Many Entangled effects can be removed using Athletics. Use the Aid action to assist an ally in overcoming these conditions.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Actions/Common Actions/Standard Actions/Aid.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Attack Action
item.description:
When you take the Attack Action as a Standard Action, you dedicate your turn to all-out offense. This allows you to make a number of attacks up to your highest Attack Speed, in any non-conflicting combination. Attack Speed is a product of which weapon you have on hand, but not all attacks must be with a weapon.
Action-Attacks are a special type of Standard Action, which by default can also be used as an Attack with an Attack Speed of 1. Most combat Spells, Combat Maneuvers, and Techniques are Action-Attacks.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Actions/Common Actions/Standard Actions/Attack Action.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Drained
item.description: A stacking condition that decreases all Rolls and Potency by 1. Lowers your current and maximum HP by 5 each stack. One stack is removed when Resting for a week straight.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Drained.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Siphoned
item.description: The creature is severed from its magic. It is not capable of casting Spells, Concentration, or using its activated Supernatural abilities. Constant effects, effects from items, or effects that were already cast remain in effect.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Siphoned.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Status
item.description:
A Status Effect is a condition that is placed on a creature to apply CC, change their rolls, and otherwise modify how they interact with the world... For better or for worse.
See:
Ablaze
Affliction
Anchored
Asleep
Bleed
Blinded
Blurred Vision
Charmed
Chilled
Clumsy
Confused
Cursed
Dazed
Defeated
Dominated
Drained
Entangled
Entombed
Fascinated
Fatigued
Frightened
Glowing
Grounded
Held Down
Invincible
Invisible
Knocked Down
Mindless
Necrosed
Pacified
Prone
Shaken
Sickened
Silenced
Siphoned
Staggered
Stasis
Stunned
Submerged
Surprised❗
Taunted
Time Out
Unassailable
Unstoppable
Untargetable
Wet
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Status.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Taunted
item.description:
A Taunted creature must use all their attacks on the target of the taunt, and must include the target in all of their special attacks (Spells, Supernatural, etc.). A taunted creature can only move if the movement puts them closer to the creature that taunted it.
A creature taunted by 2 or more creatures may decide which they'd like to attack (assuming they attack at all).
More extreme forms of taunt may restrict the types of actions the creature can take while taunted.
item.guid: Core Rules, How to Play/Status Effects/Taunted.md
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Summoning
item.description:
The Summoning Tag is placed on abilities that conjure a creature.
Many summoned creatures are specific individuals that you must form a Summoning Contract with. However, Summoning Techniques do not usually call for a specific individual, instead conjuring a temporary disposable Minion with no prior setup.
Summoned creatures instantly disappear when Defeated.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Close Range
item.description: Close Range is the shorter of the two Range increments for Ranged Attacks with Ranged Weapons, where there is no ACC penalty.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Long Range
item.description: Long Range is the longer of the two Range increments for Ranged Weapons, in which you take a -4 ACC penalty.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Range
item.description: Weapons with ranged capabilities (thrown or otherwise) will also have a listed range. Ranges come in an X/Y format, with the X range increment being the accurate range (Close Range), and the Y being second range increment (Long Range), taking a -4 penalty.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Provide First Aid
item.description: Use Trained Medicine as a Standard Action to cure a creature in reach of Status ailments. You can remove Sickened stacks, Bleed, and Blurred Vision. The DC of removing any of these conditions is the DC of the ability that inflicted them.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Butcher
item.description:
Spend a minute to use Survival to skin, drain, dress, and otherwise harvest the organic components from a recently killed creature.
Obtaining organic loot from creatures is an important part of the game. Creatures that have listed drops when butchered will always give these items without a check if there is not a listed DC.
Any organic materials that reasonably spoil will do so if not used in a timely manner (varies based off the part, but no less than 3 days).
Using Survival to get additional resources beyond what is listed in a creature's entry grants materials worth an amount equal to the creature's LV^2 times 10. This has a DC of 10+creature's LV. At the DM's discretion, the harvest can be worth more or less or made easier or harder depending on the rarity of the creature and demand for its products.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Skewer
item.description:
Weapon Innate Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge
Compatible with these Weapon Groups:
Blade
Bow
Thrown
Thrust
Trigger
Weapon must deal Pierce Damage.

Make an attack against a target. If you hit, target an additional adjacent target that is on the opposite side of them. Continue making attacks until you miss or deal no damage, or there are no more adjacent targets in a line. If using a melee weapon, the additional targets do not need to be in reach.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Blood Rush
item.description:
Tier 1 Blood Art Spell
Standard Action, At-Will
Healing
Transmutation

Target must save or suffer SP Bleed. If they are not a Minion, you heal for 1 HP every time they take this damage.
Upcast 2 - + SP Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Pyrrhic Might
item.description:
Tier 1 Blood Art Technique
Free Action, At-Will
Buff

Take 2d8 Damage, and gain +10 Speed and +1 AS.
Using this ability expels steaming blood from your body, creating a tangible red aura around you that smells and tastes of iron.
Upcast 2 - +2d8 self-inflicted Damage, +10 Speed, +1 AS.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Bloodline Mimicry
item.description:
Tier 2 Blood Art Spell
Standard Action, Limited
Polymorph, M (Vial of blood)
Transmutation

You drink the blood of a creature, and your appearance morphs into that of the creature. You can choose to appear to be closely related instead.
This change does not give you any of the abilities that the creature has, nor does it change your statistics in any way (except for your Size, but not your Reach). If you so wish, you can change only part of yourself into the creature, such as only your head, or only the backside of a centaur.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Gemarteld
item.description:
Tier 2 Blood Art Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge
Healing

Perform a Melee Crit on a willing ally. You heal for the damage dealt.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Sanguivory
item.description:
Tier 2 Blood Art Spell
Standard Action, Recharge
Healing
Transmutation

Rend the blood of the target to replenish your own, restoring 10 HP.
This Provokes, and kills target Defeated creatures.
This qualifies as eating for the purposes of benefiting from a Long Rest.
A given corpse can only be eaten once. Its Food drops are destroyed.
Upcast 2 - +5 Healing.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Blood Armor
item.description:
Tier 3 Blood Art Technique
Passive
Buff

While Bleeding and below 50% HP, gain +2 AC.
While below 10 HP, this bonus increases to +4.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Blood Blitz
item.description:
Tier 3 Blood Art Spell
Action-Attack, Limited
Healing
Transmutation

The target must save or take 3 SP Bleed (Fortitude reduces to d6). You heal for half the damage they take from this spell.
Upcast 1 - +1 SP Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Death's Dance
item.description:
Tier 4 Blood Art Technique
Free Action, Limited
Buff

All incoming Damage is reduced by half, before applying any defensive qualities.
The reduced damage is stored. At the end of your third turn with this buff active, you take twice as much damage as you have stored as Magic Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Blood Barrage
item.description:
Tier 5 Blood Art Spell
Action-Attack, Limited
Healing
Transmutation

Every creature in the area must save or take 2 SP+CL Bleed (Fortitude reduces to d6). You heal for CL HP for every creature that fails its save.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Soul Split
item.description:
Tier 5 Blood Art Spell
Passive
Holy, Healing
Conjuration

All of your Attacks and Spells deal a bonus d6 Holy Damage, and heal you for the same amount.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Blood Art
item.description:
Blood magic is a selfish, offensive set of abilities that focuses on vampiric effects and mutually assured destruction.
Blood isn't just an organic fluid - it is a fundamental force that is present in all living and unliving things. It is the physical counterpart to the soul, and as such, many Blood Arts deal Holy Damage as they split the opponent's blood and soul.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Hybrid Techniques
item.description: Hybrid Techniques are sets of abilities that have a combination of Passives, Martial Techniques, and Spells. They are intended for general use, secondary ability sets, or spellswords.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Finisher
item.description:
Tier 1 Deceit Technique
Passive, Immediate Action, Recharge
Elusive

Passively, when you deal damage to a creature with a melee Attack, you can tell if they have 5 or fewer HP remaining. If they do, you can use the active ability to instantly Defeat them, and move 20 ft.
Upcast 1 - The threshold increases by 5.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Arrow Splitter
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Make a Ranged Attack with the same total Roll as the last. It must be done against the same target.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Curved Shot
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Make a Ranged Attack, ignoring Cover at Close Range.
Upcast 2 - Ignore Improved Cover. Upcast again to ignore Total Cover, as long as the target is not completely enclosed.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Disarming Shot
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Perform a Disarm attempt with a Ranged Weapon with +2 ACC. If successful, the item you disarm continues to the end of the projectile's range and embeds into a surface or the ground, requiring a Swift Action to retrieve.
Upcast 1 - Target takes +d6 Damage of the Weapon used.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Dive
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Instant Action, Recharge

Move 10 Ft and become Knocked Down. If done in response to a Ranged Attack, the AC bonus from being Prone applies, which can cause the attack to miss.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Eye of the Amazon
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Passive
Buff

Ranged Weapons gain 20/40 Range.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Focus Shot
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Target a creature with a Ranged Weapon. At the start of your next turn, if you still have Line of Effect and they are in Range, make a Ranged Attack against it with +10 ACC and +d6+LUK Critical Damage. You do not take a Long Range penalty.
Upcast 1 - +5 ACC, +d6+LUK Critical Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Pinning Shot
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Make a Ranged Attack against a target that is near a surface that leaves the target Entangled. They are pinned to a nearby surface by the projectile. This condition can be removed as a Swift Action by the target or its allies.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Ranger Whack
item.description:
Tier 1 Marksmanship Technique
Standard Action, At-Will

Make a Melee Shove attempt with a Ranged Weapon. The target is Surprised❗ against this attack.
Upcast 1 - +2 ACC.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Distant Shot
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Make a Ranged Attack at up to double your weapon's Long Range without an attack penalty.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Double Shot
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Make two Ranged Attacks against the target.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Eagle Eye
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Passive

Gain +4 Perception, and you can clearly see fine details (such as text, patterns, or texture) from any distance as if they were up close.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Hailbreaker
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Instant Action, At-Will

If you have a Ranged Weapon in hand, and you did not make any Attacks on your last turn, you can parry Ranged Attacks that enter your weapon's Close Range. Roll your ACC against theirs; if you exceed theirs, the attack is negated. You can parry an amount of times up to your weapon's AS.
If you made fewer attacks than your AS on your last turn, you can use the unused remainder to perform this Technique.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Inferno Quiver
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Swift Action, Recharge
Fire

Your Ranged Attacks this turn gain d4 Fire Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Piercing Shot
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Make a Ranged Attack that targets everything in a line, up to your weapon's Close Range.
Upcast 1 - +d6 Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Slaying Shot
item.description:
Tier 2 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, Limited

Make a Ranged Attack that deals an additional 2d10 Damage.
If you Defeat an enemy with this attack, this Technique is not consumed, and this Technique gains +1 AS during this Attack Action, up to your weapon's AS.
Upcast 1 - +d10 Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Arrow Rain
item.description:
Tier 3 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Make a single Ranged Attack that targets all creatures in the radius.
Upcast 1 - +d6 Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Hamstring Shot
item.description:
Tier 3 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, At-Will

Make a Ranged Attack that inflicts -15 Speed on the target.
Upcast 1 -
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Straw Puppet Milicien
item.description:
Tier 3 Marksmanship Technique
Swift Action, Limited
Companion, Summoning, Supernatural

Summon a Straw Puppet to your aid.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Fire Back
item.description:
Tier 4 Marksmanship Technique
Immediate Action, At-Will

When targeted by Ammunition, roll Reflex against the target's Potency. If you succeed, you negate the attack, and can fire it back at them with a Ranged Attack if you have the right weapon (such as a bow for a caught arrow, or an empty hand for a dart).
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Named Bullet
item.description:
Tier 4 Marksmanship Technique
1 Minute Cast Time, Limited
Supernatural

Imbue Ammunition with the conviction to defeat a specific enemy. You must know the specific individual's name, or else this ability has no effect.
This ammunition deals half damage to any target besides the specific individual. Against that individual, it gains +2 ACC and +d6 Critical Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Strafe
item.description:
Tier 4 Marksmanship Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Make a Ranged Attack, and double the weapon's AS. This bonus AS must be used for Ranged Attacks.
Upcast 1 - Attack one additional time.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Marksmanship
item.description:
Technique Tree.
Marksmanship focuses on the use of ranged weaponry, strategy, and nimble footwork to dominate the battlefield.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Gore Paint
item.description:
Tier 1 Savagery Technique
Passive
Buff

You are covered in blood, sludge, ectoplasm, or other entrails as you fight.
After defeating an enemy, or while at or below 10 HP, gain +15 Speed and +d10 Critical Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Seismic Stomp
item.description:
Tier 2 Savagery Technique
Action-Attack, Recharge

Attempt a Fell at +4, rolling once against all creatures within 10 Ft. If successful, the creatures also take 2d6 Crush Damage.
Upcast 1 - +2 bonus, additional d6 damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Savagery
item.description:
Technique Tree.
Savagery embodies the raw, untamed essence of primal fury, and visceral instincts. Those who follow this path tap into a wellspring of unrelenting strength and ferocity, transforming their bodies into instruments of destruction. With each blow, they become forceful avatars of chaos, rending flesh and shattering earth beneath their feet. Their rage fuels an indomitable resilience, allowing them to shrug off pain as they rampage through the battlefield, leaving piles of corpses and the ruins of civilization in their wake as they advance with their bodies painted in the blood of their foes.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Tongues
item.description:
Tier 1 Enthrallment Spell
Passive
Divination

You can understand all spoken non-secret languages. Has no effect on written text. When you speak, other creatures can understand you, even if you don't speak the same language.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Stage Fright
item.description:
Tier 2 Enthrallment Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Subtle, Mind-Affecting
Illusion

The target makes a Will save, or suffers a -2 penalty to ACC and Skill bonuses. Whenever they initiate an Attack or opposed Skill check and miss or fail, they take SP+CL Psychic Damage. They get a new save every time they take this damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Astral Alignment
item.description:
Tier 3 Lunar Spell
Standard Action, Limited
Divination

You can foresee the alignment of the heavens, but you do not know when it will occur. Add +4 to your next Luck Check.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Boneshaker
item.description:
Tier 1 Necromancy Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Necrotic
Transmutation

A successful Monster Lore identifies whether or not a creature has a skeleton if you are unsure.
A non-Undead target must save or take SP+CL Necrotic Damage and be Staggered.
An Undead target makes a Charge Attack against a creature of your choice. An unwilling Undead may resist this with a save.
Upcast 1 - non-Undead targets take +1 SP Necrotic Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Decompose
item.description:
Tier 1 Necromancy Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Necrotic
Transmutation

The target corpse rots instantly, leaving clean bones behind.
Against an Undead, the target instead takes SP Necrotic Damage.
Upcast 1 - +1 SP Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Enervate
item.description:
Tier 1 Necromancy Spell
Action-Attack, At-Will and Limited
Healing
Conjuration

You must be Drained to cast this spell.
Make a Ranged Attack against a target. On a hit, you transfer one stack of Drained from yourself to the target, and this ability is expended.
If you are not drained, this spell instead inflicts Drained 1 on you and heals for 5.
Upcast 1 - You can transfer an additional stack of Drained with the attack, or gain an additional stack of Drained and +5 healing from the self-targeted version.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Grasp of the Grave
item.description:
Tier 1 Necromancy Spell
Action-Attack, At-Will
Earth
Transmutation

The target must save or be Entangled by grasping arms from the earth. These arms share your statistics - when hit with an attack, or if they fail a save against a damaging effect, they disappear.
The target can also use Athletics against your Potency to escape.
Upcast 1 - Target an additional creature.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Grave Robber
item.description:
Tier 1 Necromancy Spell
Passive
Divination

You can sense the presence of corpses and tombs in range. When you see a corpse, you can tell what its name was in life. You can read faded writing on tombstones.
As a Standard Action, you can pull a corpse from the earth, as long as it's not inside of a container.
Undead creatures of a lower level than yourself gain an aura in your vision.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Halt Undead
item.description:
Tier 1 Necromancy Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Transmutation

You command an Undead creature to halt, and it must save or be Entangled.
Intelligent Undead get a new save at the end of their turns.
Upcast 1 - Target an additional Undead creature.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Necromancy
item.description: Necromancy focuses on the creation and maintenance of Undead creatures, as well as curses and killing magic.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Illumination
item.description:
Tier 1 Prismancy Spell
Passive
Light, Fire
Evocation

Whenever you use a Light spell to hit a creature with an Attack, or they fail a Save against it, they begin Glowing for 1 round.
When you apply Glowing to an enemy, you or an ally can Attack the target to end the condition immediately and deal an additional SP Fire Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Prismatic Barrier
item.description:
Tier 2 Prismancy Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Light, Healing
Abnegation

Grant allies and yourself 2 SP Temp HP for one round.
Enemies must make Reflex saves or begin Glowing for one round.
Upcast 1 - +1 SP Temp HP
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Ricochet Reflection
item.description:
Tier 2 Prismancy Spell
Swift Action, Recharge
Light, Concentration
Evocation

You create a zone that twists light and projectiles that appears as a giant mirror. Any creature that can see the mirror can use it to curve their Line of Effect, and to determine Cover, unlike a regular mirror. This also functions for projectiles and line attacks, as the mirror curves their trajectories towards whatever you see in the mirror.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Shimmering Ray
item.description:
Tier 2 Prismancy Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Fire, Light
Evocation

Make a Ranged Attack that deals 2 SP Fire Damage, and the target begins Glowing.
If the target is Glowing, this instead consumes the Glowing status, ending any Concentration effects, any Grab they are holding, and inflicting Blurred Vision for one round.
Upcast 1 - +1 SP Damage
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Repelling Light
item.description:
Tier 3 Prismancy Spell
Action-Attack, Recharge
Light, Concentration, Mind-Affecting
Evocation

Undead and Fiends that start their turn in or attempt to enter the globe of light must make a Will save or attempt to flee the globe.
Undead and Fiends in the globe have -2 ACC.
Upcast 1 -
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Rainbow Beam
item.description:
Tier 4 Prismancy Spell
Action-Attack, Limited
Fire, Light, Buff
Evocation

Line attack deals 6 SP+CL Fire Damage to enemies, but instead of harming allies, it grants them a Lucky Rainbow - visible as an aura around them. They may consume this rainbow to reroll any one Attack, Save, or Skill Check within a minute, after which it disappears.
Glowing enemies become Sickened 2.
Upcast 1 - +1 SP Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Sabre of Light
item.description:
Tier 4 Prismancy Spell
Swift Action, Recharge
Fire, Light, Martial
Evocation

Imbue a melee slashing weapon in hand with searing light and make an attack with it, adding +CL ACC and SP+CL Fire Damage.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Heal
item.description:
Tier 1 Vitalism Spell
Standard Action, Limited
Healing
Conjuration

Heal yourself and allies for 2 SP+CL, and end Bleed effects.
Undead must save or take this as Holy Damage.
Upcast 1 - +SP Healing.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Spare Life
item.description:
Tier 1 Vitalism Spell
Standard Action, At-Will
Healing
Conjuration

You bind the target's soul, blood, and mana in place, which brings it back to life for 2 Rounds. It will die again when this spell ends, unless it is healed to 0 HP or higher, and the effects that killed it are removed (such as surgically reattaching/casting Regenerate on its head, or removing a death curse).
You can cast this spell again if the target dies again, as long as you cast it within the time limit.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Turn Undead
item.description:
Tier 1 Vitalism Spell
Standard Action, At-Will
Fear, Mind-Affecting
Illusion

Target Undead must save or become Frightened for one round.
Turning effects function on Mindless Undead.
Upcast 1 - Target one additional Undead.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Regenerate
item.description:
Tier 3 Vitalism Spell
Standard Action or 8 Hour Cast Time, Limited
Healing
Transmutation

Restore a creature's severed or damaged body part. If it has the body part on its person, this spell is a Standard Action, and Stuns for one round as it is reattached and mended. If it does not have the body part, it takes 8 hours to cast this spell, and the creature is Stunned for the entire cast time.
Reattaching an appendage leaves a serious scar where it was severed. The target suffers the Placeholder Affliction.
When generating a new body part, the new one will look smoother and be discolored. The target suffers the Placeholder Affliction.
The body part does not function until the associated Affliction is removed.
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia

item.title: Spell
item.description:
Spellcasting is a general title that applies to a specific type of magical effect, with specific rules. Spells do not encompass all magic, but it is the most common type. Most Spells are Techniques.
All spells have some kind of visual effect associated with their casting before the effect occurs. Magic circles shining fingers and eyes, words manifesting into physical objects and circling the caster are all means to easily identify when a creature is casting a spell. The only exception to this is spells with the Subtle tag.
This is also the case for Innate Casting.
Spellcasting takes into account your Caster Level and Spell Power, and requires using Somatic, Material, and Verbal Components (Innate Casting does not require components).
item.dc:creator: Malon Elenia
